introduction: I'm Antonio, a Computer Engineering student passionate about web development and cybersecurity. Although lacking professional experience as a developer, I've gained solid skills in technologies like Angular and Firebase during my studies. Confident in my ability to make a significant contribution, I'm excited to apply my knowledge in a professional setting and grow alongside a passionate team.
